Title: The 15:17 to Paris
Writer: Dorothy Blyskal (screenplay by), Anthony Sadler (based on the book by), Alek Skarlatos (based on the book by), Spencer Stone (based on the book by), Jeffrey E. Stern (based on the book by)
Actors: Ray Corasani, Alek Skarlatos, Anthony Sadler, Spencer Stone
Plot: An attempted terrorist attack on a Paris bound train is prevented by three courageous young Americans. Their friendship was their greatest weapon that saved the lives of those on board.
Production: Warner Bros. Pictures, Malpaso Productions, Village Roadshow Pictures
